```{r}
#卡提諾 按讚留言分享數
library(tidyverse)
df_crazyck101 <- pages_crazyck101 %>%
  group_by(type) %>%
  summarise(likes=mean(likes_count), comments=mean(comments_count), shares=mean(shares_count)) %>%
  arrange(desc(shares))
df_crazyck101
```

